Remove a specific peer from the connection list.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the remove_peer endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Remove a peer from the connection list","required":["ip","ban"],"properties":{"ban":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to ban the peer from reconnecting","example":false},"ip":{"type":"string","description":"IP address or hostname of the peer","example":"127.0.0.1:8444"}},"title":"RemovePeer"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
